languages.text: "О, правда? Так друкари подле тебя лишь трофей? И по странной случайности не имеет совершенно никакого отношения к происходящему на моей планете?"

traits.locale_text: "О, правда? Так друкари подле тебя лишь трофей? И по странной случайности не имеет совершенно никакого отношения к происходящему на моей планете?"

languages.text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
languages.original_text: "О, правда? Так друкари подле тебя лишь трофей? И по странной случайности не имеет совершенно никакого отношения к происходящему на моей планете?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

languages.text: «¿No me diga? ¿Entonces el Drukhari que tiene al lado qué es, un trofeo? ¿Y da la casualidad de que no tiene absolutamente nada que ver con lo que ocurre en mi planeta?».
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No me diga? ¿Entonces el Drukhari que tiene al lado qué es, un trofeo? ¿Y da la casualidad de que no tiene absolutamente nada que ver con lo que ocurre en mi planeta?».

languages.text: “噢，真的吗？你身边那个黑暗灵族只是你的战利品，是吗？这还真巧，莫非他和我的行星上发生的事情没有任何关系吗？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，真的吗？你身边那个黑暗灵族只是你的战利品，是吗？这还真巧，莫非他和我的行星上发生的事情没有任何关系吗？”

languages.text: « Ah, vraiment ? Alors le Drukhari à côté de vous est un trophée, c'est ça ? Et bien sûr, sa présence n'a absolument rien à voir avec ce qui se passe sur ma planète ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, vraiment ? Alors le Drukhari à côté de vous est un trophée, c'est ça ? Et bien sûr, sa présence n'a absolument rien à voir avec ce qui se passe sur ma planète ? »

languages.text: 「本当か？お前の隣にいるデュカーリは戦利品に過ぎないのか？奇妙な偶然の一致であり、俺の惑星で起きた出来事とはまったく関係がないのだな？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: 「本当か？お前の隣にいるデュカーリは戦利品に過ぎないのか？奇妙な偶然の一致であり、俺の惑星で起きた出来事とはまったく関係がないのだな？」

languages.text: "Oh, wirklich? Der Drukhari neben Euch ist also nur eine Trophäe? Und hat durch einen sonderbaren Zufall überhaupt keine Verbindung zu den Geschehnissen auf meinem Planeten?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, wirklich? Der Drukhari neben Euch ist also nur eine Trophäe? Und hat durch einen sonderbaren Zufall überhaupt keine Verbindung zu den Geschehnissen auf meinem Planeten?"

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? O hâlde yanındaki Drukhari de ganimet, değil mi? Tesadüfün böylesi o zaman. Gezegenimde olan bitenle hiçbir şekilde bağlantısı yok sanıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The Drukhari next to you is but a trophy, then? And by strange coincidence has absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
